title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Ground and Air Forces Neutralize Hamas Terrorists Across Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF soldiers neutralized armed terrorists and attacked many targets of the Hamas terror organization in a joint operation between ground and air forces.

The Air Force attacked numerous targets of the Hamas terror organization across the Strip in the last day. Among the targets attacked were command centers of the organization, military buildings, launch sites and other targets. In addition, several targets were attacked from the air to assist the ground forces operating in the Strip.

In the south of the Strip, the Paratroopers Brigade combat team continues to raid terror targets and neutralized several terrorists in the last day. During the battles, the Paratroopers Reconnaissance Unit identified two terrorists by drone, one of the terrorists fired towards the drone and both were neutralized. In addition, the forces unveiled a charge that was concealed in the area of operation and neutralized it.

Also in the Khan Yunis area, the combat team of the 7th Brigade neutralized 12 terrorists in several different encounters.

In the center of the strip, the Nahal Brigade combat team neutralized several terrorists over the last day.
In one of the activities, an Air Force unit identified a group of terrorists near the ground forces. Within minutes, the brigade’s fire array attacked the group and neutralized several terrorists.

In the north of the Gaza Strip, the 215 Fire Brigade directed an aircraft that attacked several targets of the Hamas terror organization, during the attacks a Saiyan Battalion Commander’s aide was neutralized.
In another attack, an aircraft attacked a vehicle and neutralized three terrorists belonging to the Hamas terror organization.

Attached is documentation from attacking targets of the Hamas terror organization and neutralizing terrorists throughout the Strip: https://bit.ly/3T0hy0x

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activities in the strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1602022454120
